Class XMPPBroadcaster

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Trackable
public class XMPPBroadcaster
extends AbstractBroadcasterProxy

Simple Broadcaster implementation based on Smack, and XMPP library.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
